channel.title: Asteroid comet of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the asteroid comet of the day.

item.title: 2015 TB145
item.description: 2015 TB145 is a sub-kilometer asteroid, classified as near-Earth object and potentially hazardous asteroid of the Apollo group, approximately 650 meters (2,000 feet) in diameter. It safely passed 1.27 lunar distances from Earth on 31 October 2015 at 17:01 UTC, and passed by Earth again in November 2018.
